title: Trouble with upscale using Cudnn - Error Code 3228369022
body:
Running Windows 10, 64-bit
Nvidia GTX 970
Installed cuda_11.0.3_451.82_win10
Installed cudnn-11.0-windows-x64-v8.0.2.39

Using CPU appears to work however can take over 3 days for some files.

When attempting to use Cudnn once it starts upscale processes they fail with error code 3228369022
-------------------------------------------------------------

[90m2020-08-15 13:08:05.722115 [+] INFO: [upscaler] Subprocess 7264 executing: 'C:\Users\USERNAME\Downloads\video2x-4.6.0-win32-full\video2x-4.6.0-win32-full\dependencies\waifu2x-caffe\waifu2x-caffe-cui' --tta 0 --gpu 0 --batch_size 1 --crop_size 128 --output_depth 64 --output_quality 8 --process cudnn --model_dir 'C:\Users\USERNAME\Downloads\video2x-4.6.0-win32-full\video2x-4.6.0-win32-full\dependencies\waifu2x-caffe\models\cunet' --scale_height 1080 --scale_width 1920 --noise_level 3 --mode noise_scale --output_extention png --input_path 'C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmppmiismau\0' --output_path 'C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmpi4li2823'[0m
[90m2020-08-15 13:08:05.747760 [+] INFO: Starting progress monitor[0m
